tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Subject: Positive Recommendation for Dr. Shiva Shankar Roy.



Hi Sir,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to express my gratitude for the exceptional care and expertise you provided during my recent wisdom tooth extraction. Despite my initial concerns about the pain, your skillful approach and the prescribed pain management plan made the recovery surprisingly smooth.I was particularly impressed by the swift reduction in pain within the first 24 hours, and I found the prescribed Tramadol to be effective. In fact, I only needed one dose as the pain diminished significantly.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the results of the surgery and appreciate your professionalism throughout the entire process. I believe others could benefit from your expertise, and I would like to recommend you to anyone in need of dental care.

Thank you once again for your excellent service.üôè



Best regards, Sanjay Kumar Prasad!
reply_text: Thank you so much for such a lovely words

review: I have had the experience of several dental procedures and majorly Dental Implants for full mouth rehabilitation under Dr Shiv Shankar Roy. I have had an impeccable smooth and seamless dental treatment experience. Dr Shiv Shankar has demonstrated genuine passion, proficiency, and utmost care throughout the process. He is very approachable open to all queries and available for follow-up through the treatment. He ensures that the patient has the utmost care and comfort level. I have been associated with him as my dentist for the entire family for a long period and it has always been a welcoming and professional ambiance with desired outcomes. I would highly recommend him for his exceptional services and patient care for all people with dental issues to give him a visit without hesitation to get that perfect smile.

I am grateful for his excellent work and professionalism.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Roy for my dental scaling and filling. The doctor is very friendly, caring, humble, yet technically very sound. He is really patient to listen to the problem and discusses the treatment very nicely. That gave me the initial confidence. Throughout the treatment process, he made me feel relaxed and calm. Overall, I am very happy with the treatment and would like to visit him in the future (though I pray I don't need it). I'd be very happy to recommend others too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Well I had a age old decayed tooth that reached required extraction and immediate implant. I was neglecting this for quite some time as I was never explained properly regarding my condition by other doctor.This changed when I met Dr Roy. In the first meet itself I was explained regarding the roadmap to medical procedure. Dr Roy is very friendly and very patient. He explains each and every point with great detail. And not to forget his assistants who are equally good.
Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a tartar buildup (a thin yellow and black color layer) on my teeth. I visited Dr Shiva Shankar Roy and had my scaling done the same day. A huge thanks to the doctor and his team for their effort. Everyone experiences some form of tartar or plaque buildup. If you are facing this issue, do not hesitate to schedule this appointment. The result is a fresher smile that you are sure to enjoy.
